data.title: Alargan International Real Estate (ARGAN) News

data.text:
Alargan’s earnings up 42% in 2019

Mubasher: The consolidated financial statements of Alargan International Real Estate indicated a rise in profits by 42.7% during the fiscal year (FY) 2019 to KWD 787,064 ($2.54 million) from KWD 551,737 ($1.78 million) in 2018. The positive 2019 …

Alargan’s profit plunges 52% YoY in Q3-19

Mubasher: Alargan International Real Estate has reported a 51.7% year-on-year profit decrease during the third quarter of the fiscal year 2019. The company’s profit dropped to KWD 57,460 ($189,560) in Q3-19, compared to KWD 118,990 ($392,550) in …

Kuwaiti developers’ profits nearly halve in Q2-19

By: Mohammad Farouk Mubasher: The profits of 34 Boursa Kuwait-listed real estate companies dropped 40.8% year-on-year to KWD 14.34 million ($47.3 million) during the second quarter of 2019. In the first six months of 2019, the real estate …
